fields.name: Administrator
fields.description: Full system access - can configure system settings, manage users, and access all modules

fields.name: Manager
fields.description: Department oversight and approvals - can approve work orders, NCRs, and manage department staff

fields.name: Planner
fields.description: Work order creation and scheduling - can create WOs, assign procedures, and manage production schedule

fields.name: Engineer
fields.description: Technical role - can create designs, procedures, BOMs, and manage technical documentation

fields.name: Technician
fields.description: Shop floor execution - can execute procedures, log time, and report issues

fields.name: QC Inspector
fields.description: Quality control - can perform inspections, create NCRs, and approve quality checkpoints

fields.name: Sales
fields.description: Sales operations - can manage customers, sales orders, and customer communications

fields.name: Logistics
fields.description: Logistics and receiving - can process DRSS requests, manage dispatch, and handle bit returns

fields.name: Warehouse
fields.description: Inventory management - can manage stock, process transactions, and handle material issues

fields.name: Maintenance
fields.description: Equipment maintenance - can manage equipment, process MWOs, and schedule maintenance

fields.name: Procurement
fields.description: Purchasing - can manage suppliers, create PRs/POs, and process goods receipts

fields.name: View Only
fields.description: Read-only access - can view reports and dashboards but cannot modify data
